headline: How EPAM’s New Sector-Focused AI Agents on Google Cloud (EPAM) Has Changed Its Investment Story
summary: Earlier in December 2025, EPAM Systems expanded its AI offering by launching seven AI agents on the Google Cloud Marketplace to address complex use cases in finance, healthcare, and retail. This move underscores EPAM’s push to commercialize its AI capabilities through cloud-based, sector-specific tools that can plug directly into clients’ existing workflows. Next, we’ll explore how EPAM’s launch of AI agents on Google Cloud could influence its AI-led transition and long-term investment...

headline: Is EPAM Systems Stock Underperforming the S&P 500?
summary: Despite underperforming the broader S&P 500 Index over the past year, EPAM Systems continues to draw moderate optimism from analysts regarding its forward outlook.
